_meta.source: Researched from Los Cabos Tourism, cruise guides, and local sources

bbox_hint.note: Covers marina, El Arco, beaches, downtown

transit_routes.name: Water Taxi to El Arco
transit_routes.note: Glass-bottom boats common. Can drop at Lover's Beach.

transit_routes.name: Walk to Medano Beach
transit_routes.note: Main swimmable beach. Beach clubs, restaurants, water sports.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Santa Maria Bay
transit_routes.note: Protected snorkeling bay. Calmer than main beaches.

featured_experiences.name: El Arco & Lover's Beach
featured_experiences.note: Water taxi essential. Don't swim at Divorce Beach (dangerous currents).

featured_experiences.name: Whale Watching (Dec-Apr)
featured_experiences.note: Peak season January-March. Multiple operators at marina.

featured_experiences.name: Medano Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: Only swimmable beach in town. Mango Deck popular. Can get rowdy.
